with

in
 
silico

seed
 
hydrogen
 
hyperfine
 
frequency
 
(~1.420
 
GHz)
 
as
 
the
 
umbilical
 
carrier
 
connecting
 
human
 
sensory
 
systems
 
to
 
conscious
 
awareness.

3.3  Validation  Against  Literature  
●  EMF-EEG  literature  confirms  frequency-specific  coherence  reduction  (PubMed  30974477).   ●  Proton-spin  studies  validate  spin-dependency  (ScienceDirect  10.1016/j.jmr.2015.03.003).   ●  Psychedelic  EEG  data  confirms  harmonic  expansion  (Frontiers  Human  Neurosci  2018;12:202).   
 
4.  Discussion

●  Cortical  coherence  mediates  integration  of  sensory  inputs.  
 ●  EMF  and  proton-spin  influence  neural  oscillations.

4.2  What’s  Novel  
●  Identification  of  the  hydrogen  hyperfine  frequency  (~1.420  GHz)  as  a  consciousness  
umbilical
 
frequency.
